Set Base Colour.name: base_colour
Set Base Colour.help:
Sets the theme base colour.
Default value: 'Indigo'.

Allow end-users to select own colour sch.name: colour_switcher
Allow end-users to select own colour sch.help:
Allows your users to pick their own base colour from those enabled below.
Default value: No.

Forum Layout.name: forum_layout
Forum Layout.help:
Sets the front-page display of categories and forums.
Default value: 'List'.

Disable Animations?.name: disable_css_animations
Disable Animations?.help:
Disables animated features (eg: Fading / Shifting content blocks).
Default value: No.

Enable Sticky Header?.name: sticky_header
Enable Sticky Header?.help:
When the page is scrolled down, the header will remain visible
Default value: No.

Enable guest welcome message?.name: welcome_message
Enable guest welcome message?.help:
Shows a welcome / sign-up message to guests on all pages.
Default value: No.

Guest welcome background repeat.name: guest_background_repeat
Guest welcome background repeat.help:
Background repeat option for the guest welcome message
Default setting: no-repeat.

Guest welcome background position.name: guest_background_position
Guest welcome background position.help:
Background position option for the guest welcome message
Default setting: center center.

Stretch guest welcome background to fill.name: guest_background_cover
Stretch guest welcome background to fill.help: Stretches the guest welcome background image to best fit. Recommended for large images that don't repeat. Overrides the background repeat setting.

Guest welcome background opacity.name: guest_background_opacity
Guest welcome background opacity.help:
Sets the transparency for the guest welcome background image. Lower number = more transparent.
Default setting: 1.

Postprofile Side.name: postprofile_side
Postprofile Side.help:
Sets which side avatars / post counts display on when reading a topic.
Default setting: Right.

Show 'joined' date on post profiles?.name: join_date
Show 'joined' date on post profiles?.help:
When enabled, the user's 'joined' date will be visible next to posts and private messages.
Default Value: No

Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.name: credit_line
Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.help: We'd rather you didn't, but it's OK if you really want to :(
